title: Michelangelo
description: The art and life of Michelangelo (1475-1564), the renowned painter, sculptor, architect, and poet, with reference to early biographies, his artistic development, and the demands of his patrons. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for Art and Design majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A, and one course from Area C3 or ART 211 or ART 212
